segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout with the sink on the right and cabinets on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It overflows and forms a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a step stool in front of the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches one hand into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby with her arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter near the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back from the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR
